data.name: NormalizedToeplitzMatrix_IndexOutOfRange
data.value: The index should be between -N and N, where N is the size of the matrix.

data.name: NormalizedToeplitzMatrix_CantSetMainDiagonal
data.value: Can't set main diagonal values for the normalized matrix.

data.name: Solver_InsufficientMatrixSize
data.value: Matrix size is insufficient for current iteration.

data.name: Solver_InsufficientVectorSize
data.value: Vector size is insufficient for current iteration.

data.name: Solver_InvalidVectorSize
data.value: Vectors and the matrix should be the same size.

data.name: NormalizedToeplitzMatrix_ArrayDataNotNormilized
data.value: Normalized matrix should contains 1 at main diagonal (at {0} index of the array).
